title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Emotion-Based Educational Technology Design Strategies: Enhancing Expert Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Three or more strategies to reduce negative emotions (anxiety, envy, frustration) by over 30% during educational technology design can be explained
Methods for designing language learning activities to elicit positive emotions (empathy, accomplishment) can be applied to real-world cases
At least one online class module incorporating emotion design strategies can be developed even in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
